title: Can you name a song with the word 'together' in the title? - Quora

response.answer_text: “We’ll Be Together” by The Pretty Things, from their self-titled LP (1965) “What Love Has Joined Together” by The Temptations, from ‘Sing Smokey’ (1965) “Let’s Get Together” by Jefferson Airplane, from ‘Takes Off’ (1966). Also “We Can Be Together” from ‘Volunteers’ (1969).  “Get Yourself Together” by The Rolling Stones (1966) from ‘1961–1974: The Genuine Black Box’ (2010). Also: “Let’s Spend the Night Together” from ‘Between the Buttons’ (1967), famously covered by David Bowie on ‘Aladdin Sane’ (1973); “Sing This All Together” and “Sing This All Together (See What Happens)” from ‘Their Satanic Majesties Request’ (1967).  “Your Mind and We Belong Together” by Love, from ‘Forever Changes’ (1967) “Boys & Girls Together” by The Mamas & The Papas, from ‘Deliver’ (1967) “Get Yourself Together” by The Small Faces, from their self-titled album (1967) “We Could Be So Good Together” by The Doors, from ‘Waiting for the Sun’ (1968)  “Let’s Pull Together” by The Troggs, from ‘Hip Hip Hooray’ (1968) “Come Together” by The Beatles, from ‘Abbey Road’ (1969). Also “All Together Now” from ‘Yellow Submarine’ (1969). “Come Together” by The MC5, from ‘Kick Out the Jams’ (1969)  “We're Gonna Have a Real Good Time Together” by The Velvet Underground, from ‘The Velvet Underground Live 1969’ (1974) “Let’s Work Together” by Canned Heat, from ‘Future Blues’ (1970) “We Gotta Live Together” by Jimi Hendrix & Band of Gypsys, from ‘Band of Gypsys’ (1970). Also “Getting My Heart Back Together” from ‘Rainbow Bridge’ (1971).  “When Girls Get Together” by The Beach Boys, from the unreleased ‘Landlocked’ (1971). Later revived on ‘Keepin’ the Summer Alive’ (1980). “Together Let’s Find Love” by The 5th Dimension, from ‘Live’ (1971). Also “Living Together, Growing Together” (1973 single). “Let’s Stay Together” by Al Green, from his album of the same name (1972). Covered by Tina Turner in 1983. “It's the Love (That Keeps It All Together)” by Nancy Sinatra, from ‘Woman’ (1972)  “Together” by The Ohio Players, from ‘Fire’ (1974) “Let's Put It All Together” by The Stylistics, from their album of the same name (1974) “Together” by Parliament, from ‘Chocolate City’ (1975) “Real Good Time Together” by Lou Reed, from ‘Street Hassle’ (1978)  “Get Yourself Together” by Daniel Johnston, from ‘Hi, How Are You’ (1983), reprised on ‘It’s Spooky’ (1989). Also “We Could Be Together Again” from ‘Lost Recordings Vol. 1’ (1983). “Come Together” by Eurythmics, from ‘Savage’ (1987) ”Always Be Together” by Sting, from ‘…Nothing Like the Sun’ (1987) “Let’s Stick Together” by Bob Dylan, from ‘Down in the Groove’ (1988) “Put Your Hands Together” by Eric B. & Rakim, from ‘Follow the Leader’ (1991) “Come Together” by Blur, from ‘Leisure’ (1991) “Come Together” by Primal Scream, from ‘Screamadelica’ (1991)  “Let’s Take a Trip Together” by Morphine, from ‘Cure for Pain’ (1993) “Stand Together” by The Beastie Boys, from ‘Check Your Head’ (1992). Also “Get It Together” from ‘Ill Communication’ (1994). “Separate, Together” by A Tribe Called Quest, from ‘Beats, Rhymes and Life’ (1996)  “Together Now” by Tricky, from ‘Nearly God’ (1996) “Come Together” by Spiritualized, from ‘Ladies and Gentlemen We are Floating in Space’ (1997) “All In Together Now” by Ol’ Dirty Bastard, from ‘Nigga Please’ (1999) “Get It Together” by J-88 (Slum Village), from ‘Best Kept Secret’ (2000) “Alone, Together” by The Strokes, from ‘Is This It’ (2001)  “Get It Together” by The Go Team, from ‘Thunder, Lightning, Strike!’ (2004) “Together We’re Heavy” by The Polyphonic Spree, from the album of the same name (2004) “All in Together Now” by DJ Muggs Vs. GZA, from ‘Grandmasters’ (2005) “Together” by The Raconteurs, from ‘Broken Boy Soldiers’ (2006)  “We Belong Together” by Bad Brains, from ‘Into the Future’ (2012) “Come Together” by The Internet, from ‘Hive Mind’ (2018)

YouTube is busy playing games by blanking links to some of its content, making them look like they have been deleted. Usuually, clicking on the blank will call up the video as normal. Now let's see if I can hold it together long enough to answer this question.  "Doesn't Anybody Stay Together Anymore" by Phil Collins  "Love Will Keep Us Together" by The Captain & Tennille  "We All Stand Together" by Paul McCartney & The Frog Chorus  "Several Species Of Small Furry Animals Gathered Together In A Cave And Grooving With A Pict" By Pink Floyd  "Let's Spend The Night Together" by The Rolling Stones  "If We Hold On Together" by Diana Ross  "Join Together" by The Who

Come Together, The Beatles Let's Spend the Night Together, The Rolling Stones Happy Together, The Turtles Get Together, The Youngbloods Join Together, The Who Teo Torriatte (Let Us Cling Together), Queen Together Forever, Rick Astley We Belong Together, Ritchie Valens Let's Stay Together, Al Green Love Will Keep Us Together, Neil Sedaka, Captain & Tennille Several Species of Small Furry Animals Gathered Together in a Cave and Grooving With a Pict, Pink Floyd We Could Be So Good Together, The Doors Someday We'll Be Together, The Supremes Let's Stick Together, Bryan Ferry We Belong Together, Mariah Carey Let's Work Together, Canned Heat

“Come Together” by The Beatles off the Abbey Road album 1969 “Happy Together” by the Turtles 1967 “Someday Will Be Together” by the Supremes 1972 “Let’s Stay Together” by Al Green 1971 “Love Will Keep Us Together” by Captain and Tennille 1975 “We’re In This Love Together” by Al Jarreau 1981 “We Go Together” by Olivia Newton John & John Travolta from the musical and movie “Grease“ 1978

“We gather together”, sung and played by Rick Lee Jones, is a song with the word “together” in the title. Hebrews 10:25 (NIV bible) “Not giving up meeting together, as some are in the habit of doing, but encouraging one another--and all the more as you see the day approaching.”

A2A Off the top of my head: “So Happy Together" — The Turtles“Love Will Keep us Together" — Captain & Tenille“All Together Now" — The Beatles“Let's Stay Together" — Al Green“We're in This Love Together" —Al Jarreau“Let's Get Together" (from The Parent Trap)“We Go Together” (from Grease)
“Come Together” and “All Together Now”, the Beatles“Get Together”, the Youngbloods (though I can’t help imagining R. Lee Ermey, may he rest in peace, delivering the chorus)
Happy Together by Alan Gordon and Gary Bonner. The song has been covered by a lot of other artists, such as The Turtles and Gerard Way featuring Ray Toro.

The More We Get Together It’s pretty much a nursery rhyme that goes like this: The more we get together, together, together The more we get together the happier we’ll be With my friends and your friends and your friends and my friends The more we get together the happier we’ll be
Mr. Big - Stay Together Canned Heat - Let’s Work Together The Turtles - Happy Together Big Country - All Fall Together The Box - Closer Together Randy Travis - Forever Together
SOMEDAY WE'LL BE TOGETHER by THE SUPREMES TOGETHER FOREVER by LINDISFARNE written by RAB NOAKES LOVE WILL KEEP US TOGETHER by THE CAPTAIN AND TENNILLE written by NEIL SEDAKA
Come Together - Beatles Happy Together - Turtles We Belong Together - Mariah Carey We’re in This Together - Nine Inch Nails
Come on People now everybody get together and try to love one another right now. Bob Dylan
So Happy Together by The Turtles
Sir, Ok, Here’s the only one I know. Thing is I can’t decide what I enjoy more ? Is it watching the ladies putting on some great dance moves or simply listening to a great song ! Jim
Together Forever - Rick Astley (1988 - #1 song)
Come Together. It’s by a band you may have heard about.
Let's Stay Together Al Green Tina Turner recorded it also.
"We Go Together" from "Grease"
Happy Together —- The Turtles
Come Together - Beatles
Happy together by the Turtles
Come Together
